Find Us

Calzone Zone EST 1997

From humble beginnings the first Calzone Zone opened its doors in the lovely neighborhood of Capitol Hill, Washington in 1997. Now they serve their community with 5 different locations spanning across the Pacific North West and reaching the sunny state of California!
